attributes.name: refEntityName
attributes.doc: name of entity which translation should function as reference for the parallax effect

attributes.name: moveSpeed
attributes.doc: the speed factor for the parallax effect which will be multiplied with the reference entity's translation

attributes.name: textureOffset
attributes.doc: an offset which will added to the parallax texture matrix (useful to set a starting texture position)

attributes.name: repeatX
attributes.doc: specifies if this parallax layer will repeat itselfs in the x direction

attributes.name: repeatY
attributes.doc: specifies if this parallax layer will repeat itselfs in the y direction
